Sherrod Brown won't rule out running for Senate again  —  The Ohio Democrat was defeated earlier this month.  —  Sen. Sherrod Brown, who was defeated Nov. 5 in his reelection bid, said he won't rule out running for the Senate again or for governor of Ohio in 2026.
